 2021-05532021-06-10,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of CURTIS CLARKE of Spruce Grove, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months.
AttachmentsAttachment
